text: The Plaxton Leopard is a bodywork of a coach manufactured by Plaxton. It has been built from 2013 to the present day. It is made by Plaxton. The Leopard bodywork was built on the Volvo B9R chassis but it is now built on the Volvo B8R chassis.Break through business, new products and frontier technology, as ADL keeps its foot on the pedal Alexander Dennis 2 October 2013Lower weight Leopard for Euro 6 Bus & Coach Professional 14 November 2013Volvo B8R Plaxton Leopard Bus & Coach Buyer 7 March 2014 The Plaxton Leopard replaced the Plaxton Profile. ==References== ==Other websites== *Flick gallery *Leopard Brochure Plaxton Leopard Category:Coaches (bus) Category:Full-size buses
title: Plaxton Leopard
